it.polimi.se2018.controller.network.server

Class PendingApprovalMatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.network.server.PendingApprovalMatch

  • class PendingApprovalMatch
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a match that has not yet been approved by all players
    Author:
    Francesco Franzini

      • PendingApprovalMatch

        PendingApprovalMatch(int timeout,
                     MatchIdentifier matchId,
                     ServerMain serverMain,
                     Client source)
        Creates a new PendingApprovalMatch with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        timeout - time(in seconds) to wait until match is aborted
        matchId - MatchIdentifier of this match
        serverMain - mainServer to use
        source - the client that originated this match
